dialogues.text: But it's Linda and Matt. FRANK (cont'd) Did you see her?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Linda rushes over to check on Carter.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Where is she?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She went to the supply room. Carter  needed blood.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Linda grabs a stethoscope and listens to Carter's heart.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I said no one goes anywhere alone.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She didn't listen.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She-slowly pulls Frank's hand away from the wound. FRANK (cont'd) But...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He's dead.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Linda would love to cry about it, but doesn't afford  herself the luxury.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The three of them approach the supply room door slowly.  Blood trickles from under the door and bloody footprints  extend down the hallway. They swing open the door. The floor is covered in blood and broken glass. But no  body.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sarah, broken, is dragged toward the chair, eerily  jerking down the hallway... seemingly on its own.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The three scientists follow the bloody footprints down  the hallway past the empty cages in the tunnel of  habitats. All clutch their tranquilizer pistols. The footprints lead past the habitats to Sebastian's  chamber. They see Sarah's body in the dim light.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh god. Sarah!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The group breaks into a run. Linda pushes into the  chamber and falls at Sarah's side. Matt cradles Sarah's  head. They look for some sign of life as Linda fights  back the tears. LINDA (cont'd) No...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Her too?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Matt nods. Linda slams the cubicle wall with her fist.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: This didn't happen. This hasn't  happened.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It happened alright. Now we have to  deal with it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Matt puts his hands on her shoulder to calm her. She  pushes him off.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yeah? And just what are we supposed to  do now?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Now? Now you die.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The three of them whip around.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He's here!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Where?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sebastian!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Silence. The three cautiously move out. They stand back  to back, each one facing out. They move toward the door  of the Chamber. LINDA (cont'd) Sebastian. Sebastian, listen to me.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No response. They all their tranq pistols level waiting  for some sign. Hearing each other breathe. They slowly  move outside the Chamber into the corridor.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I don't know if you can understand  this, but what you're experiencing is  a psychological breakdown. This isn't  who you are.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A beat.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I would say that what I am  experiencing is psychological  awareness. I like you being in  complete and absolute control.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They identify the general area the voice is coming from:  Back inside the Chamber! They slowly move toward the  Chamber door. With lightning speed they slam the door  shut, locking Sebastian inside the Recovery Chamber.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You goddamn bastard! You goddamn  bastard. You're gonna pay for this.  I'm going to bring you back to  visibility and then I'm going throw  your ass in jail.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You're never gonna bring me back  Linda. I never want to come back.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Fuck you!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Or maybe I'll fuck you. One last time  for old times sake.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Linda slams her fist against the wall of the Chamber.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Don't listen to him. It's not worth  it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Come on, Matt. Let's go get the  elevator back on-line so we can got  out of this hell hole.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Matt gives Linda a kiss...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He does anything, anything at all,  come get us. I'll be back to check on  you in five.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Matt and Frank head off down the corridor.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Imagine you two, carrying on right  under my nose. Out of curiosity, what  did he give you that I couldn't?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Shut up, Sebastian. He's more of a man  than you'll ever be.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A VIDEO SCREEN shows Linda pacing outside the Chamber  door. The chair moves forward toward a microphone.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Okay, sweetie. I'll be quiet. If  that's what you want...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sebastian TOGGLES the intercom switch OFF. We pan over to one of the working video screens ... Matt and Frank  stride down the hallway. The chair swivels and the  observation room door swings open slightly.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Linda still holds his tranq gun toward the door. Nothing  moves. Nothing. Linda walks over to the Plexiglas ...  stares in. Can't see anything, anyone. Just the dead  Sarah. Then she sees it. The little red light on the intercom.  Its on.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sebastian? Sebastian? No.. No...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Linda bangs on the glass. She looks. No movement, no  nothing. She listens. Shit. She takes off running. LINDA (cont'd) Matt! Frank!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Tracking with Linda as she rushes down the hall. LINDA (cont'd) Matt! Matt! Frank!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Linda breaks in the room to see Frank slicked in blood,  his throat cut, and Matt bleeding from multiple stab  wounds with an extension cord around his neck being  pulled tight.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jesus!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Linda rushes over and slams into Matt. They fall to the  ground. Linda crawls over to Matt, but her head snaps  back and her lips erupt with blood.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Figured it out? You were always so  clever.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Matt's pulled back across the lab by the cord around his  neck. He grabs at the cord trying to breathe. Linda  watches him being pulled away.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She clamors over to him. But Matt rises in the air and is tossed against the lab table. Linda levels her dart  pistol and fires haphazardly at the air. She hits nothing but objects jerk and move in a line as Sebastian heads  for cover. Linda manages to grab Matt and pull him to  her. LINDA (cont'd) Hang on!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Get out of here!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Linda pulls Matt toward the door.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (yelling) You won't get away with this. They'll  find out about you. They'll hunt you  down.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The villagers with their torches? Lock  up your daughters! Sorry, Lin. It's  not gonna happen that way.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Linda hits the lights. The lab is now very, very dark. SEBASTIAN'S VOICE (cont'd) See, I've spent all my time down here  thinking up this plan. When they find  you, they'll find a pile of charred  corpses. The result of a terrible  accident, I'm afraid.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Linda reacts to the voice as it grows nearer. She  navigates the maze of equipment, heading toward the crack of light at the front door.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: How can you be so brutal?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I guess because I don't have to look  at myself in the mirror anymore (beat) Remember that first night I was out? I  did something bad, just to see if I  could get away with it. And when I  did, I realized I could have it all. I  can kill in broad daylight. And  nobody's gonna tell the police they  were fucked by a ghost. Anything I  desire I can make happen, but not if  people know.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Linda and Matt have reached the door of the lab. She  pushes through it and slams it behind her.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Linda pulls Matt along.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm dizzy. I can't feel my legs.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Just keep going. I'll fix you later.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The doors explode open.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Linda looks up and down the hall and pulls Matt inside  the supply room. It's still blood soaked from earlier. Linda closes the door, sliding the deadbolt into place. Linda lots him drop like a heap onto the floor. She falls to her knees beside Matt, lying on the ground.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Matt... Matthew. Stay with me now.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Linda pulls his scrubs open. The wounds are many and  deep.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He surprised us. We weren't  expecting...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Shhh. Don't talk.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: BAM! Something slams against the door. Bam! Slams against it again. The old deadbolt is buckling. Linda looks  around the room and sees the storage freezer. LINDA (cont'd) We gotta move. Hang on.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Linda helps Matt up and into the storage freezer.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Linda grabs a metal bar and slides it between two hooks  on the door and the jam. BAM! The storage room door blows open. Linda leans down  next to Matt.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Lin...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He entire shirt is stained with blood. He's having  trouble breathing. MATT (cont'd) I can't feel anything.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Linda picks up his hand. Grips it tight.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You feel that?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Matt smiles.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A little...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She rips his shirt open... and sees his wounds. She grabs a vial of alcohol and dumps it on her hands and then  probes the wound.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Your losing blood, but he didn't hit  the vitals.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She looks around. LINDA (cont'd) Sutures and thread.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She rises, and looks outside the porthole into the room.  Suddenly it fogs up and she almost sees a face. She  stumbles backward, and the door starts rattling. Linda  scrambles over to hold the metal crowbar in place.  Sebastian pulls and rattles on the freezer door. To no  avail. It's not gonna budge. Finally he gives up. The  door stops shaking. Linda is relieved, briefly.  Still.  Then she hears the click of the door locking.

dialogues.speaker: OUTSIDE THE FREEZER
dialogues.text: CLOSE ON THE REGULATOR as the dial turns from forty-five  degrees, down to negative twenty.

dialogues.speaker: INSIDE THE FREEZER
dialogues.text: Through the porthole, Linda sees the bloody footprints  heading toward the door. She removes the metal bar and  pushes on the door. It won't move.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Goddamnit.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Linda looks around the storage room. She grabs a roll of  duct tape and pulls off a length.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What're you doing?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: This is temporary.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She takes paper towel and cleans off Matt's wound. She  tapes it, using duct tape. LINDA (cont'd) You still with me?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Barely.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A beat later, the compressor begins pumping Arctic air  into the freezer.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Just keeps getting worse.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Linda returns to the door. Shakes it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We hear WHISTLING as we see a sheet of flesh fill out  into a head as Sebastian slides on his latex head piece.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Linda continues shaking the door. The lock holds. A tear  rolls down Linda's cheek, but a strange thing happens.  The tear drops freeze. Linda shivers as she pulls the icy tears from her face.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh shit.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The inside thermometer has dropped to five degrees. Linda grabs the metal bar and starts smashing it against  the porthole. The metal bar just bounces off the glass.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A drawer opens, revealing a set of clothing neatly  folded. Shirt, pants, shoes. They begin to move.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Linda drops the metal bar and slides down the wall,  defeated.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: There's no way out.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: There's got to be.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They say freezing to death isn't so  bad. You just kinda pass out.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Matt's head rolls back.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Matt! MATT!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She checks his pulse. Thank god he still has one, but  he's not gonna last long. They're both already starting  to turn a little blue. Linda stares desperately up at the shelves, trying to find some sort of advantage. Then she  sees something. She looks back at the door lock and then  she rises ... and grabs AN EXTENSION CORD coiled on the  shelf. LINDA (cont'd) We're not dying in here.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sebastian, dressed in street clothes, stands before the  mirror applying make-up to his latex mask.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Linda finishes stripping the insulation off the electric  cord.  She grabs a hypodermic needle package, and her cold  fingers fumbles with the package as she tries to pull out the plastic tube. She finally gets it out and she starts wrapping the  stripped electric wire around the tube in a tight coil.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sebastian slides on a wig and checks his appearance in  the mirror. Pretty smooth. Even from relatively close up, he could pass as normal.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Linda furiously winds wire into a coil.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sebastian heads down the corridor. Lingering steam twists in and around the hallway, long wispy tendrils. Sebastian pauses for a moment, hearing A GROWL. Suddenly the  hallway seems a lot scarier. From beneath his scrubs he  pulls his own tranq gun. He listens ... hearing scraping  and footsteps. Watching the water on the floor twitch.  With machine like precision, he turns and fires. The  tranq dart halts in mid-air and some invisible thing  tumbles over. Sebastian continues down the hallway.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Linda holds the plug end of the extension cord. The other end is wrapped into a tight long coil. Linda looks for an outlet, but can't find one. She looks at the overhead  lights. A moment later she's climbing up the shelving. She wrap*  a piece of fabric around her hand, and with a sharp punch she smashes one of the overhead light bulbs.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sebastian enters, fully dressed. At a distance it'd be  hard to tell his secret. He pulls several chemicals off  the shelves. Then he pulls a tray of test tubes over and  begins mixing.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Linda works on jerry rigging the two ends of the wire to  the lightbulb, socket.  Suddenly the coiled wire springs to life and flies  against the nearest metal surface. She's made an  electromagnet.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sebastian loads the filled test tubes into the  centrifuge. Dozens of other vials are already slotted. He takes one of the left over vials, considers it a moment  and then flings it over to the other side of the lab. The vial shatters and... EXPLODES. A powerful explosion that rocks the room.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Linda feels the rumbling as she places the coil up  against the door. The magnet attaches itself. Linda  shakes the coil, trying to get the doorlock to move.

dialogues.speaker: OUTSIDE THE DOOR -
dialogues.text: We see the lock twitching. Shaking...

dialogues.speaker: INSIDE THE DOOR -
dialogues.text: Linda shivers as she plays with the coil. Her eyes glaze  and she stumbles backward. Her surgical scrubs, once  soaked with sweat, are now frozen stiff. She composes  herself and pushes back toward the door. Her heavy breath hangs as a low cloud of Mist.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sebastian looks over the dozens of other test tubes,  calculating their combined power in his mind. Then he  closes the top of the centrifuge. He taps a few commands  into its timer.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The door lock twitches again and twists back. The door  swings opens and Linda stumbles out, mashing into a  supply shelf of oxygen canisters. The canisters tumble  every which way as Linda tumbles to the ground. She scrambles to her feet and goes in after Matt, pulling his cold body out of the storage locker. She pulls stacks of paper down from, the shelves into a  trashcan, grabs an industrial lighter and ignites the  paper. She pushes Matt close to the small bonfire. As she does, the oxygen tanks catch her eye.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sebastian exits the lab, locking the door behind him. He  heads down the darkened tunnel. Something scampers in  front of him. Small, not visible. Sebastian sends it  reeling with a swift violent kick.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sebastian, dressed and in full latex, comes striding up  the tunnel. He taps a code into the elevator vault doors. The vault doors open revealing the elevator. The doors slide open and Sebastian steps inside.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Authorization please?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Caine. One One One One One.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Authorization valid. Thank you.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sebastian!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: And there's Linda. Slicked with dirt and blood. She holds a oxygen container with a cut line. LINDA (cont'd) I can't let you leave. Come on out and  I'll give you one last chance.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You said it yourself, Lin. I shouldn't  hold on to the past.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The door starts to shut.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Aaaaaaahhhh!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She hits the top of a LIGHTER duct-taped to the hose. A  line of PRESSURIZED FIRE BLOWS into the elevator.  WWHHHOOOOSSHHHH! Sebastian goes up in flame. Linda runs  toward the elevator. Just as the door's about to close,  she slides. Her foot jamming into it.  She lets loose with the flame again. Sebastian, backed  into the corner, has no where to go. He's yelling in  pain. His latex FACE BUBBLES and burns. The surgical  scrubs SINGE BLACK. With no other escape route, he dives  toward the door. Linda looks up to see his flaming body  fly over her, back into the corridor. Linda kills the  tank as Sebastian continues to burn. The elevator lights  flickers and the security panel goes up in a shower of  sparks. The elevator dies. Linda pulls herself to her  feet and turns to see... Half of Sebastian's head MELTED AWAY, his latex facade a  gruesome smoke-damaged mass. His clothes are half burned  revealing large blistering bubbly welts underneath, like  deformed blackened bubble wrap. Sebastian crawls to his feet, but Linda hits him with  another shot of flame. Sebastian pulls at his clothes as he crawls around the  corner.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh God!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Linda stalks toward him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You wanna see God? I'll show you God.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Linda turns the corner to see a heap of smoldering latex  and clothing strewn about the corridor floor. Sebastian,  looking like some ugly creature, pushes down the  corridor. He throbs with his blackened skin blistering  and cracking up and down his body. Linda lets loose  another jet of flame. It's smaller than the first and  doesn't quite hit Sebastian. Linda checks the tanks  pressure gauge. It slowly drops. Linda follows the  blackened horror into the maze of tunnels. But as he  pushes along the corridor, his burns slowly re- absorb  themselves. Sebastian is no longer visible. A quiet  moment in the hallway as Linda realizes how vulnerable  she is. She looks around for him desperately. Nothing.  But something on the ceiling catches her attention. She  blasts it with the last jet of her dying torch. THE  SPRINKLER SYSTEM, hit by fire, comes to life. Water  sprays down on the tunnel. Sebastian is caught in the  downpour, his invisible frame outlined by water. It comes toward her, the hot skin steaming in the water. He grabs  Linda and slams her against the wall. His watery hand  smashes her across her face. Linda reels. On the floor,  she looks to see Sebastian stalking toward her. She  crawls away, but he grabs her by her hair, pulls her to  her feet and slams her against the wall.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm gonna find everyone in your family  and kill them-. Your sister... she  never liked me. I think I'll go after  her and her little boy first.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sebastian smashes her head against a metal post. Her head cuts open, blood dripping down. SEBASTIAN (cont'd) I just wanted you to know that before  you die.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Linda collapses to the floor. Sebastian's foot presses  against her neck, squeezing it. Linda gags for breath.  But through the shoot of water that is Sebastian, we see  something also... a watery smudge.

dialogues.speaker: BAM
dialogues.text: MATT - smashes Sebastian with the metal bar. Sebastian  slams against the corridor wall and sinks down. Matt staggers. It's taken all his strength to got there.  He drops the crowbar and seeks the wall for support, he  sinks to his knees by Linda.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Thought I'd... thought I'd save you  for a change.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He gives her his hand and pulls her up into his arms. MATT (cont'd) Let's got out of here.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Just as the two turn, Sebastian rises with the crowbar.  He swings it with a yell. Matt pushes Linda out of the  way, his arm glancing the blow into a conduit. The  conduit splits open and severs ELECTRICAL wiring. The  VOLTAGE shoots up the crowbar and into Sebastian. As the  current pulses through his body, Sebastian vibrates. His  blood vessels yank back to visibility, followed by his  skeletal structure and major organs. Sebastian is slowly  electrified. Smoke pours off him and he becomes more and  more visible. Finally he collapses. His body throbbing in and out of visibility. Matt and Linda stumble away.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Just outside the lab... Linda tries to pry open the  sealed doors with the crowbar. But she can't. Through the doors porthole she sees a collection of  chemicals and the fire raging from the earlier explosion.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nitro...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Matt peaks inside.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He said it himself... All they'll find  is a pile of charred corpses.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She sees the centrifuge... The timed counter on its face  counts down from a minute. Fifty nine. Fifty eight. Fifty seven...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He's rigged the centrifuge.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: In an enclosed space, he'll wipe out  the whole lab.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Linda and Matt move as fast as they can. They reach the  burned out elevator. What the hell are they gonna do? We  know the damn thing doesn't work. She swings her crowbar  at the ceiling. The maintenance hatch comes down.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Grab on.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Linda hooks the crowbar onto the hatch lip and pulls  herself up. She reaches back down for Matt.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Forget about me. You go.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Fuck you. Give me your hands.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Linda grabs Matt's hands and pulls for all she's worth.  She struggles, but they both manage to got him through  the hatch.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Three... two... one. The centrifuge springs to life. The centrifuge spins the two dozen vials slowly at first.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Linda and Matt are on top of the elevator. Linda's hands search the wall. Bar fingers run across the smooth metal surface. From the little light below she can see a maintenance  ladder that spans the entire height of the vertical tube. They look up and see it disappear into the darkness.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Climb!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: But...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Climb!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Matt starts up, rung after rung. Linda climbs right  behind him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The centrifuge spins faster and faster. The vials are  starting to rattle.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Linda and Matt pull themselves up the ladder as quick as  they can.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I can't. I'm going to pass out.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Keep moving.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He does, through sheer force of will. Blood from his  wound drips down on Linda's face. No telling how much  further they have to go in this darkness. Light leaks in  from the maintenance hatch below.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The centrifuge's whine has reached a fevered pitch. The  vials shake violently. Then... one of the vials shatters. A FLASH OF LIGHT. A HUGE EXPLOSION rips through the  laboratory.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The EXPLOSION rips through the lab doors. A MASSIVE  FIREBALL rolls down the tunnel swallowing everything in  its path. One of the phase shifted animals gets caught in the  flames. We see its shape briefly before it disappears In  a wall of fire.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The ladder begins to shake. The entire shaft begins to  rumble. Linda pushes Matt up as they scramble toward  safety.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The FIREBALL blows into the vent. Starts rolling down it  also.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: More explosions.

dialogues.speaker: CHAIN REACTIONS. BOOM
dialogues.text: THE EXPLOSIONS rolls toward the OPEN ELEVATOR. Slamming  into it... The elevator flies upward.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The rumbling worsens. The two desperately cling to the  ladder. They looks down to see... The elevator... SURROUNDED BY FLAMES flying up toward them, lifted by the explosion's SHOCK WAVES.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh God!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Don't look.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The carriage accelerates toward them, faster and faster.  Its loose cables whip around the shaft, slapping the  walls around the pair. Its gonna hit them! Linda pulls  herself close to the ladder and closes her eyes. She's  pressed against Matt. The elevator... 50 feet... 40 ...  30 ... W0000000SH! It flames RIGHT BY THEM.  When Linda opens her eyes, the elevator is HUNDREDS OF  FEET ABOVE THEM and a wall of fire is below them, closing in.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Move!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Panicked, Linda pushes Matt up the ladder as she stares  down at the rising fire wall. But the fire dissipates  before it hits them, though a stray tongue of flames  reaches up to lick the soles of her feet. They hear a terrifying moan and looks up to see the  elevator peaking far above her. It slows to a stop and  BEGINS TO FALL.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's coming down!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: FASTER AND FASTER. Coming back toward them in complete  free- fall. It's emergency brakes clamp down, slowing it. Metal against metal. Sparks flying. One of the brakes  shears. Then another. The elevator unseats from it's  tracks, SLAMMING against the walls as it TUMBLES. Linda  sees that the elevator is out of control, and watches as  it ping-pongs toward them... smashing into the access  ladder, smashing into the wall. The elevator slows, but  continues slamming side-to-side. Linda cringes as the  elevator crashes into the wall above them. But it jams  there, stopping. They pull their heads away from wall and look up. The elevator just hangs there, suspended.  There's a small crawlspace between the elevator and the  ladder.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: C'mon. Before it slips.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They begins to climb up again. Matt shimmies through the  tight hollow, and squeezes out the other side, followed  by Linda. She breathes a sigh of relief and just hangs  there a moment when ... Ah! Something grabs her. A singed throbbing hand emerges from the darkness, gripping at her leg. LINDA (cont'd) It's him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She kicks at it and sees a dark dirty face - a swirl of  dirt, grime and smoke with hollow eyes - rise up the  ladder.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sebastian, you fuck.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Get off me.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sebastian pulls himself up Linda's body. Translucent  dirty hands paving at the fabric of her clothes. Linda  tries to climb with this thing on her. But Sebastian  grabs her around the neck. She begins choking for breath. Linda fights to keep her grip on the ladder... She looks  down at the ten foot drop to the elevator and then... She lets go!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She and Sebastian plummet through the smoky haze and slam against the top of the elevator. Linda seems to hover a  few above the elevator, Sebastian's shadowy outline below her. Matt painfully lowers himself down the ladder. But  metal groans and the elevator drops another five feet.  Linda struggles to her feet. Sebastian rises. A menacing  dark figure stalking toward her. Linda pushes back from  him. Sebastian grabs her by the hair and pulls bar over  to the ladder. The elevator strains and groans.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Let go of me.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sebastian presses her up against the ladder. Presses into her from behind. He has her trapped. His dirty hand  reaches out and strokes her hair.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Remember the day we met? You were  wearing a red dress and you were so  pretty. Now... Now look at you.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Get off of her!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sebastian pulls her hair back and kisses her neck with  his filthy, dirt-smeared mouth and half-burned away face. MATT (cont'd) Sebastian, stop it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Linda and Sebastian struggle. Matt reaches down to try  and grab her, help her.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You fucked it all up.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Linda looks at her feet. The last elevator emergency  brake grips its cable. She grits her tooth and grabs hold of the ladder.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Go to hell.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Linda stamps on the brake release. The ELEVATOR TUMBLES  ... along with Sebastian. It slams into the fiery abyss a hundred yards below. Linda hangs, one hand holding onto  the ladder, the other holding onto Matt. Matt pulls her  back onto the ladder, using all his remaining strength.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Linda and Matt stumble out into the blazing sunshine.  Emergency crews close from all directions, sirens  roaring. A trail of smoke drifts higher and higher into  the sky. An ambulance pulls up next to them and the paramedics hop out, immediately putting a blanket around her and  treating Matt's wounds.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What happened?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We lived.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Linda looks over her shoulder at the traces of the ruin  and she sees a shimmer of heat rising from the ground...  almost as if something was there.
